modName: Mute player Imperial race block in combat without stamina
summary:
This mod is a plus for the mod "No player moans by dAb", My mod mute the male Imperial, nord and I think the other ones too, mutes the player voice groan in combat when he block and was left of stamina
You can install it from Nexus Mod Manager or copy in the path of Skyrim where you installed the game D:steamSteamAppscommonSkyrimDatas
descriptionHtml:
This mod is intended to be a little add for people who like play without groans and moans when your player are in combat, If you have the mod "No player moans by dAb" My mod is perfect because The mod by dAb is an excellent mod but I notice when I play like an Imperial in combat the player was left stamina and block he emitting a loud sound of groan, and every time when my player was left of stamina happened that, so I decide to change that, I search in all huge list .fuz files and suddenly I founded the 3 files of the groan sounds, It took me some time but I finally I did it :)
I hope you enjoy this If you need it

and If you want other mod like this (about other races sound or change sound effects) feel free to tell me and I will see what I could do

Works with Imperial race, Nord, and I think the other ones you should try it
Have fun and shut off your character crying


-------------------------------------------------------------------------by Maredark3d (Medieval)-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Maredark3d
